relation: A silly version of Buzz-Buzz done for fun.

A Conducting Spirit. Thanks to people for helping me with ideas on this -- Arty, Cap'N Muffin and Stevesesy and possibly someone else helped me brainstorm this one (no pun intended). Thnaks very much! :D
I had done this picture a while back, and later decided to touch it up, mostly because I used to work on a darker monitor, and this is more how it was originally intended to look.
textBeforeTable: > O < Other Submissions by ozwalled For an experimental effect, I added a glossy layer to the sunglasses such that when the painting is hanging on the wall of my apartment, and you're looking at it from a few feet away or more, my livingroom's light is reflecting off the glasses, obscuring the Giygas pattern. When you get closer to it though, your shadow casts onto the painting, canceling the reflection and revealing the Giygas images on the lenses. Each of the lenses is about the size of a quarter. A (bad) picture of the lenses reflecting can be seen here: http://starmen.net/forum/?t=getfile&id=36511&private=0 The 'Zombie Chick' from Threed. This image has been resized for your convenience. Click on it to view the full size version.
